Cloud block storage cloud volumes powered by OpenStack and Fleio are now available in Cluj region.

![](https://intovps.com/content_images/create-volume-block-storage.png)

Both SSD and HDD backed storage is available.

For enhanced safety and performance your data is kept in 3 copies on 3 different physical servers.

You can create and manage the block storage volumes and compute instances (virtual machines) from:

* the web interface ([Fleio control panel](https://demo.fleio.com/))
* OpenStack CLI
* OpenStack API

Create volumes, attach them to virtual machines (multiple volumes can be attached), extend size, detach from one VM, attach to another and pay per GB-hour.

## SSD backed storage

* write speed up to 700 MiB/s
* price: $0.00012 / GBh or $0.08 / GB / month
* no extra cost for I/O operations
* minimum size: 20 GB
* allowed size: 20 increments

So if a 20 GB SSD volume is used for the whole month it costs $1.60 / month.

## HDD backed storage

* write speed up to 320 MiB/s
* price: $0.000075 / GBh or $0.05 / GB / month
* no extra cost for I/O operations
* minimum size: 20 GB
* allowed size: 20 increments

So if a 20 GB HDD volume is used for the whole month it costs $1 / month.

Block storage volumes created in Cluj can be attached to any of your Cluj compute instances.

[Sign up for a cloud account](https://intovps.com/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=45) ($10 credit pre-pay)
